adDetails: Bay Point Woodworking specializes in installing all types of crown mouldings and ceiling trims. > Specialty crew can prepaint in shop then install and touch-up in place so the job takes minimal time and mess in your lived in home. > Brand new homes are our specialty. It is better to install crown moulding first then paint your new colors on the walls. Save Time!! > We paint as we go so when the crown is finished the complete job is done. > We also offer a 15% discount on all mouldings purchased during the job. > The installation is per lineal foot and a free estimate is offered upon measuring space for crown moulding. > We can also install on ceilings up to 22' tall and in circular stairways. > Curves? not a problem. With the proper radius we can custom order "Flex Trim" and have it delivered in two weeks ready to install. > Combined Bay Point Woodworking installers have over 50 years of experience installing Crown and Trimwork Call now for a free estimate, James show contact info
